data.lyric:
[ti:Before You Go]
[ar:Lewis Capaldi]
[al:Before You Go]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Before You Go - Lewis Capaldi
[00:01.04]Lyrics by：Lewis Capaldi/Tom Barnes/Pete Kelleher/Ben Kohn/Phil Plested
[00:02.09]Composed by：Lewis Capaldi/Tom Barnes/Pete Kelleher/Ben Kohn/Phil Plested
[00:03.14]I fell by the wayside like everyone else
[00:07.46]I hate you I hate you
[00:08.60]I hate you but I was just kidding myself
[00:11.74]Our every moment I start to replace
[00:16.04]'Cause now that they're gone
[00:17.02]All I hear are the words that I needed to say
[00:19.93]When you hurt under the surface
[00:24.31]Like troubled water running cold
[00:30.59]Well time can heal but this won't
[00:36.55]So before you go
[00:43.57]Was there something I could've said
[00:46.62]To make your heart beat better
[00:49.21]If only I'd've known you had a storm to weather
[00:53.75]So before you go
[01:00.67]Was there something I could've said
[01:03.79]To make it all stop hurting
[01:06.55]It kills me how your mind can make you feel so worthless
[01:10.89]So before you go
[01:20.36]Was never the right time whenever you called
[01:24.68]Went little by little by little until there was nothing at all
[01:28.87]Our every moment I start to replay it
[01:33.27]But all I can think about is seeing that look on your face
[01:37.00]When you hurt under the surface
[01:41.40]Like troubled water running cold
[01:47.74]Well time can heal but this won't
[01:53.70]So before you go
[02:00.71]Was there something I could've said
[02:03.80]To make your heart beat better
[02:06.56]If only I'd've known you had a storm to weather
[02:10.92]So before you go
[02:17.87]Was there something I could've said
[02:20.96]To make it all stop hurting
[02:23.78]It kills me how your mind can make you feel so worthless
[02:28.22]So before you go
[02:34.05]Would we be better off by now
[02:38.24]If I'd have let my walls come down
[02:42.58]Maybe I guess we'll never know
[02:45.85]You know you know
[02:52.18]Before you go
[02:56.54]Was there something I could've said
[02:59.58]To make your heart beat better
[03:02.32]If only I'd've known you had a storm to weather
[03:06.69]So before you go
[03:13.66]Was there something I could've said
[03:16.65]To make it all stop hurting
[03:19.42]It kills me how your mind can make you feel so worthless
[03:23.81]So before you go
data.trans:
[ti:Before You Go]
[ar:Lewis Capaldi]
[al:Before You Go]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.04]//
[00:02.09]//
[00:03.14]像其他人一样 我也没能走到终点
[00:07.46]我恨你 我恨你
[00:08.60]我恨你 这不过是自欺欺人
[00:11.74]我试图去忘记我们在一起的每一刻 
[00:16.04]因为都已是过往烟云
[00:17.02]脑海里回荡的都是我的肺腑之言
[00:19.93]当你的心受伤时
[00:24.31]就像湍急的河水冷冻结冰
[00:30.59]河水尚且有融化之时 可此心无法被时间治愈
[00:36.55]在你离开之前
[00:43.57]我还有什么话能说
[00:46.62]可以打动你
[00:49.21]要是我早些留意到你积压的不满就好了
[00:53.75]在你离开之前
[01:00.67]我还有什么话能说
[01:03.79]让这一切停止伤害
[01:06.55]这几乎让我心如死灰 你怎会觉得这一切都是错付了呢
[01:10.89]在你离开之前
[01:20.36]无论何时你都无暇打来电话吗
[01:24.68]时间一点点流逝 直到我一无所有
[01:28.87]我开始重温我们在一起的每分每秒
[01:33.27]我满脑子想的都是你的一颦一笑
[01:37.00]当你的心受伤时
[01:41.40]就像湍急的河水冷冻结冰
[01:47.74]河水尚且有融化之时 可此心无法被时间治愈
[01:53.70]在你离开之前
[02:00.71]我还有什么话能说
[02:03.80]可以打动你
[02:06.56]要是我早些留意到你积压的不满就好了
[02:10.92]在你离开之前
[02:17.87]我还有什么话能说
[02:20.96]让这一切停止伤害
[02:23.78]这几乎让我心如死灰 你怎会觉得这一切都是错付了呢
[02:28.22]在你离开之前
[02:34.05]我们像现在这样真的会更好吗
[02:38.24]如果我早些放下我的固执己见 会不会有不同结局
[02:42.58]也许我想 我们永远没有答案
[02:45.85]你知道的 你知道的
[02:52.18]在你离开之前
[02:56.54]我还有什么话能说
[02:59.58]可以打动你
[03:02.32]要是我早些留意到你积压的不满就好了
[03:06.69]在你离开之前
[03:13.66]我还有什么话能说
[03:16.65]让这一切停止伤害
[03:19.42]这几乎让我心如死灰 你怎会觉得这一切都是错付了呢
[03:23.81]在你离开之前
